SEARCH

Uses of Package
JEST.controller

Packages that use JEST.controller
Package
Description
JEST.controller
This package contains the controller of the application : ConsoleController : It permits the interactions between the user and the console, using the scanner.
JEST.model
This package contains the controller of the application : Game : This is the most important class of the game.
JEST.model.virtualPlayer
This package contains the three strategies possible for VirtualPlayer : We have the AgressiveStrategy, the DefensiveStrategy and the RandomStrategy.
JEST.view
This package contains the classes adapted to the view of the application : We have the MainWindow and all the panels.
  • Classes in JEST.controller used by JEST.controller
    Class
    Description
    GameController
    Interface that defines all interactions between the game and the user.
    GameController.MessageType
    Message type for display.
  • Classes in JEST.controller used by JEST.model
    Class
    Description
    GameController
    Interface that defines all interactions between the game and the user.
    PlayerRouter
    Lightweight router that delegates player-specific operations to the appropriate controller based on the player's preferred interface (GUI or Console).
  • Classes in JEST.controller used by JEST.model.virtualPlayer
    Class
    Description
    PlayerRouter
    Lightweight router that delegates player-specific operations to the appropriate controller based on the player's preferred interface (GUI or Console).
  • Classes in JEST.controller used by JEST.view
    Class
    Description
    GUIController
    Graphical User Interface implementation using existing View classes.
